title: A Very Easy Problem!
text:
InputThere's no input.OutputOutput some form of these numbers: 137, 1315, 73, 136, 255, 1384, 16385, one per line in the listed order.ExampleThe first two lines of the CORRECT output file are:137=2(2(2)+2+2(0))+2(2+2(0))+2(0)
1315=2(2(2+2(0))+2)+2(2(2+2(0)))+2(2(2)+2(0))+2+2(0)The correct output file should contain 7 lines.
